tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE quality_control_metrics (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id UUID,
    product_id UUID,
    infection_rate DECIMAL,
    reported_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE InfectionRates (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  infection_type VARCHAR(50),
  infection_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE QualityMetrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  metric_name VARCHAR(50),
  metric_value FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE infection_rate (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    date DATE,
    infection_type VARCHAR(50),
    rate DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE quality_control (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    batch_id INT,
    quality_rating INT,
    inspector VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE InfectionRates (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  infection_type TEXT,
  infection_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name TEXT,
  age INT,
  gender TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Hospitals (
  hospital_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  hospital_name TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  capacity INT
)

CREATE TABLE Reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  report_date DATE,
  analyzed_by TEXT,
  result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE InfectionRates (
  country VARCHAR(50),
  infection_rate FLOAT,
  date_reported DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Hospitals (
  hospital_id INT,
  hospital_name VARCHAR(100),
  location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10)
)

CREATE TABLE Infections (
  infection_id INT,
  patient_id INT,
  infection_type VARCHAR(50),
  severity VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE Reports (
  report_id INT,
  hospital_id INT,
  date_reported DATE,
  status VARCHAR(20)
)
